EMAIL_WAS_SENT_MSG:
We've sent you an email with instructions for resetting your password.
The link therein will be valid for 1 hour.
ENTER_YOUR_EMAIL_MSG: Enter your email address below and we'll get you back on track.

ERROR_MSG.INVALID_FIELD_1: Must contain only letters, digits, underscores and hyphens{{- part2 }}
ERROR_MSG.INVALID_FIELD_2: , and a "@" as separator between Username and Tenant name
ERROR_MSG.INVALID_INPUT: The input you provided is invalid or incorrect, please try again.
ERROR_MSG.MUST_CONTAIN: Must contain only letters, digits and underscores
ERROR_MSG.RESET_LINK_EXPIRED:
The password reset link you've clicked has expired, but you can
go back and request another.
ERROR_MSG.RESET_PASSWORD: Oops! Something went wrong while trying to reset your password. Please try requesting another email.
ERROR_MSG.WRONG_CREDENTIALS: You provided wrong credentials to the service you tried to access.

RESET_PASSWORD_MSG: Hooray! We've reset your password, and you can now log into your account.
